name: Idol Master SP, The - Shiny Festa - Groovy Tune [PSP]
description:
The Idolmaster Shiny Festa is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 25-10-2012. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play The Idolmaster Shiny Festa on iOS, PlayStation 3 and PSP.
Yōzō Sakagami produced the game.
